mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*,@rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum FROM ( SELECT bo_no , bo_title , bo_category, bo_writer , bo_pass, bo_content, bo_hit , DATE_FORMAT(bo_reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS bo_reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(bo_mod_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS bo_mod_date , bo_del_yn FROM free_board,(select @rownum:=0) r WHERE bo_del_yn='N' ORDER BY bo_no desc ) a )b WHERE rnum between #{firstRow} and #{lastRow}

SELECT bo_no , bo_title , bo_category, bo_writer , bo_pass, bo_content, bo_hit , DATE_FORMAT(bo_reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS bo_reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(bo_mod_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS bo_mod_date , bo_del_yn FROM free_board WHERE bo_no=#{boNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( bo_title, bo_category , bo_writer , bo_pass, bo_content , bo_hit , bo_reg_date , bo_mod_date , bo_del_yn ) VALUES( #{boTitle} , #{boCategory}, #{boWriter}, #{boPass}, #{boContent}, 0, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), null, 'N' )
